resources.name: List all Cocoa Batches
RHZ Chocolate Bars
resources.description:
RHZ Chocolate Bars Management API Documentation.

You can checkou the project by acessing it's [GitHub respository](https://github.com/Guilherme-Ferreti/rhz-chocolate-bars).

resources.name: Get a Cocoa Batch
Create a Cocoa Batch
Delete a Cocoa Batch
resources.description:
Delete a Cocoa Batch.

### Path Params
`id` Cocoa Batch id.

```response:204
No body returned for response
```

```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized."
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message": "Record not found."
}
```

resources.name: Update a Chocolate Bar
Chocolate Bar Consultation
resources.description:
Allows you to get public information about a Chocolate Bar.

### Path Params
`code` Chocolate bar unique code.

```response:200
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "weight": 1000,
    "code": "c9OgMy7N",
    "created_at": "2021-07-08T01:06:55.000000Z",
    "updated_at": "2021-07-08T01:06:55.000000Z",
    "cocoa_batches": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "origin": "Organic",
        "provider": "RZM Kakau",
        "grams": 950,
        "created_at": "2021-07-08T01:06:55.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2021-07-08T01:06:55.000000Z",
        "percentage": 95
      },
      {
        "id": 2,
        "origin": "Preprocessed",
        "provider": "RZM Foods Brazil",
        "grams": 50,
        "created_at": "2021-07-08T01:06:55.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2021-07-08T01:06:55.000000Z",
        "percentage": 5
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message": "Record not found."
}
```
